instruction:
I want to watch two or more videos in same time on VLC. I tried to run multiple instances of VLC. It worked but can't play videos on those new instances. When I play video it plays on first instance instead of new instance.
Is there any way to solve this problem?
_comments: In Tools > Preferences > all preferences > playlist, you should have an option for 'Use only one instance when started from file manager'. When unchecked, it should allow you to play multiple videos at the same time.

command: import pyautogui; import time; pyautogui.click(960, 540); time.sleep(0.5);
